1 channel Switch - 503 BOX - ZWavene button Smart Glass Switch Switch Device for Modbus System with one switche for lighting control or alternatively, sequential pre-programmed settings Configurable aural feedback
Available in British Standard & European Standard; Dimensions:BS 95x95mm; EU 125x95mm; Dimming is by the "iPod Â®-like" touch control Capacitive technology to adjust lighting level.
